title: Unfairly Fired From the Healer’s Guild After Five Years of Dedicated Service – Despite Always Being the Weakest, With My Super-Ultimate Skill in Hand, I Aim to Become the Strongest! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Slice of Life
tags: Abusive Characters   Adventurers   Cautious Protagonist   Character Growth   Cooking   Demi-Humans   Discrimination   Dungeons   Friendship   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Healers   Herbalist   Hidden Abilities   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple POV   Naive Protagonist   Poor to Rich   R-15   Skill Assimilation   Slow Growth at Start   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Sword Wielder   Time Skip   Tomboyish Female Lead   Weak to Strong   Wizards
author: Okamoto Takeya   岡本剛也
description:
“I see… As I thought, today was your birthday, Lewin! …Alright! Then, from today, you’re fired.”

For five years, I was trampled on and oppressed as I worked myself to death for the Healer’s Guild, but on my fifteenth birthday, I was fired.

I wallowed in frustration and self-pity while I despaired… but you can’t eat tomorrow’s fill just by despairing.

In the Healer’s Guild, I was just the odd jobs boy who was in charge of bookkeeping and classifying the medicinal herbs, but after being fired, my ultimate skill, [Plant Master] blooms.

This is the story of the dramatic turn of events where the boy who possesses the ultimate [Plant Master] skill climbs up from the very bottom of society.>
